draw.overall_supervision_plan: Serial OICs/PLs and Serial Commanders will orient soldiers to the route and expected operations during the convoy brief. Newly Identified risks will be recorded and mitigated accordingly and risk acceptance will be improved at the appropriate level. Every Soldier is considered a safety. If they see an unsafe act they will resolve the issue on-site or find someone who can. NCOs will be especially expected to enforce the briefed standards and safety precautions with Officers spot checking to ensure compliance. This is a living document. OICs will continuously monitor all aspects of the operation.
